Uses of Interface
io.atomix.messaging.MessagingService

  • Packages that use MessagingService 
    Package Description
    io.atomix.messaging
    Provides low-level interfaces for point-to-point and broadcast messaging.
    io.atomix.protocols.raft.protocol
    Provides RaftRequest and RaftResponse implementations for all internal Raft protocol communication.
